meanings.sent1: The small toy was boxed neatly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The boxed gift was waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent3: The boxed surprise made the child smile.
meanings.sent4: The boxed memories brought tears to her eyes.

meanings.definition: To put into a box for storage or shipment.
meanings.sent1: She boxed up her old clothes for donation.
meanings.sent2: The workers boxed the fragile items carefully.
meanings.sent3: He boxed the items with lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: She boxed her emotions away to deal with later.
meanings.sent5: The team boxed the products for delivery.

meanings.sent1: The two boxers boxed fiercely in the ring.
meanings.sent2: He boxed his way out of the corner.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully boxed each other in the yard.
meanings.sent4: She boxed her way through the tough situation.
meanings.sent5: The friends boxed for fun at the gym.
